positions.title: Deputy General Manager -Engineering
positions.description_html:
1. Project Planning and Execution: Devising and implementing project plans & procedures for setting up tea packaging units ,modernization of tea factories, capacity enhancement & up -gradation, jobs related to statutory requirements like labor qtrs., welfare projects, water supply and various civil constructions, installation of electrical machinery and upgradation of substations etc.
2. Procurement: Preparation and floating of tenders to vendors, evaluation of offers, techno-commercial discussion & finalization of contract. ·
3. Erection/Commissioning: Managing the installation and commissioning of electrical substation (upto 3.5 MVA 33 KV) and equipment, overseeing other mechanical and civil jobs.
4. Maintenance/Production: Overseeing the entire maintenance function, providing leadership to the Maintenance Team and focus on providing proactive maintenance solution.
5. Energy Conservation measures: Implementation of various energy efficient projects, conducting periodic energy audits , monitoring of power and fuel return ,implementation of energy conservation measures for reduction in specific energy consumption (electricity, gas, Furnace oil & Coal), power factor improvements etc.
6. Resource management :Conducting various training programmers on machinery and electrical maintenance, tractors ,JCBs, milling & chasing operations, maintenance and operation of gensets & manufacturing process etc. ( with external & internal faculty).
7. Liaison: Liased with various statutory & government bodies for ensuing seamless operation. Interfacing with external bodies like ABITA, Electricity Boards, Pollution Boards, Govt. Offices etc.
